long_description: The Vestal Canteen Zulu Watch combines a premium Japanese sub-second movement with a surgical-grade stainless-steel case and water resistance to withstand the extremes of your outdoor endeavors. Enamel-filled, screw-down canteen crown guard sits at the 2 o'clock position for added comfort. Classic dial features double printed indices and a traditional outside minute track. 22mm-wide nylon canvas wrist strap with stainless-steel hardware. The Vestal Canteen Zulu Watch resists water down to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Vestal Canteen Zulu Watch combines a premium Japanese sub-second movement with a surgical-grade stainless-steel case and water resistance to withstand the extremes of your outdoor endeavors.
